channel.title: How to define variable
channel.description:
how do i define variable s and s1 to fix this error: PS: THIS IS A CLIENT ERROR i keep getting this error when i try to compile my client so i can jar and sign it plz help:
.\sign\signlink.java:239: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s location: class sign.signlink s = "C:/.BlackWings_file_store_32/"; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:240: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s1 location: class sign.signlink s1 = ""; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:241: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s1 location: class sign.signlink File file = new File(s1 + s); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:241: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s location: class sign.signlink File file = new File(s1 + s); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:243: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s1 location: class sign.signlink return s1 + s + "/"; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:243: cannot find symbol symbol : variable s location: class sign.signlink return s1 + s + "/"; ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 6 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
plzzz help im begging

item.title: How to define variable

@egyptmo21 wrote:

item.title: How to define variable
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Ugg… replace String s with String s = “C:/.BlackWings_file_store_32/”;

Read full topic

Replace String s1; with String s1 = “”;

item.title: How to define variable
item.dc:creator: @egyptmo21 egyptmo21
item.description:
@egyptmo21 wrote:

how do i define variable s and s1 to fix this error: PS: THIS IS A CLIENT ERROR
i keep getting this error when i try to compile my client so i can jar and sign it plz help:

.\sign\signlink.java:239: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable s
location: class sign.signlink
s = “C:/.BlackWings_file_store_32/”;
^
.\sign\signlink.java:240: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable s1
location: class sign.signlink
s1 = “”;
^
.\sign\signlink.java:241: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable s1
location: class sign.signlink
File file = new File(s1 + s);
^
.\sign\signlink.java:241: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable s
location: class sign.signlink
File file = new File(s1 + s);
^
.\sign\signlink.java:243: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable s1
location: class sign.signlink
return s1 + s + “/”;
^
.\sign\signlink.java:243: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable s
location: class sign.signlink
return s1 + s + “/”;
^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
6 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

plzzz help im begging
